name: nodejs
readme:
Devbox automatically configures Corepack for Nodejs. You can install Yarn or Pnpm by adding them to your `package.json` file using `packageManager`
Corepack binaries will be installed in your local `.devbox` directory

init_hook: if command -v corepack &> /dev/null; then corepack enable --install-directory "{{ .Virtenv }}/corepack-bin/"; fi
